DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates the hypothesis that differences in beta-cell mass in patients with diabetes and healthy individuals can be monitored by the positron emission tomography (PET) tracer [11C]5-hydroxytryptophane.
DOC.brief_title: Studies of Pancreatic Islet Mass by Positron Emission Tomography (PET)
DOC.criteria: Adult patients with type 1 diabetes Adult, healthy controls Pregnancy Impaired renal function
